story.text: Jan 2 Water utility Aqua America Inc. (WTR.N) said its Aqua New York Inc. subsidiary acquired New York Water Service Corp., which serves about 135,000 residents in Nassau County, Long Island, for $27.4 million in cash. Under the deal with Utilities & Industries Corp. LLC to acquire the water services firm, Aqua America will also assume $23.5 million of debt. The deal will immediately add to earnings, Aqua America said in a statement. (Reporting by Sankalp Saini in Bangalore)
story.title: aqua america unit buys water services firm
